DOC.brief_summary: Following finding clinical trial drug development , global non-interventional cohort field study investigate rivaroxaban clinical practice condition comparison current standard care patient acute venous thoromboembolism ( VTE ) . The main goal analyze long-term safety use rivaroxaban treatment acute VTE routine clinical practice .
DOC.brief_title: Treatment Venous Thromboembolism ( VTE ) With Either Rivaroxaban Current Standard Care Therapy
DOC.criteria: Female male patient , > =18 year Diagnosis acute DVT and/or PE , objectively confirm Indication anticoagulation therapy least 12 week Willing participate study available followup Exclusion criterion must read conjunction local product information .
